title: Rejection
whatHappensNext1: You now need to email the applicant [
whatHappensNext2: ] to notify them why their application cannot be progressed and to reapply once the issue has been rectified.
emailTemplateContent:
Dear ((Full name)),

Your request for a court and tribunal hearings account has been rejected for the following reason(s):

Reasons for rejection:
((reasons for rejection))

You can access the court and tribunal service from the link below should you wish to make a new request.

Court and tribunal hearings service

From
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
